document_data.name: Solarium
document_data.mainbody: The '''Solarium''' was a temple dedicated to [[Horus-Re]], the Lord of the Sun within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]].
document_data.Description: The Solarium was a pyramid, the top half of which was made from shining glass. A ring of alternating white and pink marble towers surrounded the pyramid. Walkways connected the towers at different heights.
document_data.Activities: The towers surrounding the Solarium served administrative purposes for Horus-Re's clergy and the government of Skuld.
